title: High ping randomly with Bell Ontario?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Some games I will have 28 ping and then just randomly for a full game my ping will be 118, even tho that ping is playable it isnt correct and it lags like crazy. Is any one else having problems with Bell, while being in Ontario?

replies.body: It looks like something odd might be going on with that 5th node in your traceroute. I want to make sure you get as much help with that as you need, so go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to help walk you through everything that's going on in that trace, and hopefully get everything smoothed out in the process ^_^!
